turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order from Starbucks on MLK.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a grande cherry mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a grande cherry mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at MLK.
